caption.p: UV absorbance and fluorescence emission spectra of 16 oxygenated heterocyclic compound standards categorized into five groups according to their molecular structure. ( A) 7.8-disubstituted coumarins; ( B) 7-substituted coumarins; ( C) 5-substituted furanocoumarins; ( D) 8-substituted furanocoumarins; ( E) polymethoxyflavones.
